Entry.JapaneseText: <Dio>
Entry.EnglishText: <Dio>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mel>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mel>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Rondoline>
Entry.EnglishText: <Rondoline>

Entry.JapaneseText: ダオス
Entry.EnglishText: Dhaos

Entry.JapaneseText: エトス
Entry.EnglishText: Ethos

Entry.JapaneseText: Variable
ダオス、言ったよな、 インネンがなんとかって……
Entry.EnglishText: Dhaos said it was our fate...

Entry.JapaneseText: 因縁を追え、だよね
Entry.EnglishText: So we should chase after our fate.

Entry.JapaneseText: ダオスと あの仮面のヤツって 関係あんのかな……
Entry.EnglishText: I feel Dhaos and the masked two are related, somehow...

Entry.JapaneseText: <Rody>は、 なんか心当たりないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do you know of anything of the matter, Rody?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんな仮面してたら あいつらが誰かわかんないし
Entry.EnglishText: I really have no idea who those masked guys are.

Entry.JapaneseText: それに……あいつ、 肝心なこと、あんま 話さなかったしな
Entry.EnglishText: Plus, it's not like that guy...really talked much about important things.

Entry.JapaneseText: それどころか、私が ほとんど一方的に 話してた気がする
Entry.EnglishText: I seriously had to squeeze the information outta the guy. As I said, we had one-sided conversations.

Entry.JapaneseText: 夢中になっていろいろ 話した覚えはあるんだけど
Entry.EnglishText: Like waking up from a long dream, I remember our many conversations.

Entry.JapaneseText: あはは、肝心の話の中身が 全然思い出せないや
Entry.EnglishText: But I can't remember any of the important parts, I'm sorry hahaha...

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだ、それ
Entry.EnglishText: Wow that sucks.

Entry.JapaneseText: あ、空の星には たくさんの種類があって……
Entry.EnglishText: Oh...He said in the sky there are many other worlds...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……ってこれ、 ダオスがしてた話だし
Entry.EnglishText: Or so he said.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんか、あいつのしてた話は よく覚えてんだよね
Entry.EnglishText: For some reason I remember our small talk more than anything.

Entry.JapaneseText: 太陽の周りを回るアセリアは遊星、 その周りを回るのが衛星だ
Entry.EnglishText: Aselia orbits around our great sun, in turn a wandering planet orbits around Aselia. This is called a satellite.

Entry.JapaneseText: デリス・カーラーンは衛星？
Entry.EnglishText: Derris Kharlan is a satellite planet?

Entry.JapaneseText: デリス・カーラーンは彗星だ
Entry.EnglishText: Derris Kharlan is a comet.

Entry.JapaneseText: 彗星？
Entry.EnglishText: A comet?

Entry.JapaneseText: 純然たるマナの塊星（かたまりぼし）
Entry.EnglishText: It is a celestial body almost entirely composed of pure Mana.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガス化したマナは 太陽から吹く風を受けて 尾を引き、彗星になる……
Entry.EnglishText: Mana that becomes gas leaves a trail when it contacts solar wind. Therefore it is considered a comet...

Entry.JapaneseText: へぇ……綺麗なんだろうね
Entry.EnglishText: Wow! That sounds so pretty!

Entry.JapaneseText: １００年に１度、我が母星は このアセリアに近づく
Entry.EnglishText: Every 100 years my home world approaches Aselia's orbit.

Entry.JapaneseText: この星から見えるのは ５０年以上も先のことだ
Entry.EnglishText: You'll be able to see it from this planet in about 50 years.

Entry.JapaneseText: その頃、私、 もうおばあちゃんだね
Entry.EnglishText: Aw, but by that time I'll be a wrinkly old woman!

Entry.JapaneseText: ダオスは初め全然、 話してくれなくて、 ずっと私だけが喋ってたけど
Entry.EnglishText: At first Dhaos didn't talk at all and I had to do all the talking but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しずつ、本当に少しずつ 自分のことを話すようになった
Entry.EnglishText: One step at a time...He gradually started opening up to me.

Entry.JapaneseText: デリス・カーラーンとか、 『大いなる実り』とか、 旅の苦難とかのことを……
Entry.EnglishText: He talked about Derris Kharlan...His travelling to this planet, his suffering and how he needed the Mana Seed...

Entry.JapaneseText: その話を聞いて、 私はダオスのために何か してあげたいって思った
Entry.EnglishText: I was so anxious for our next talk every time. I'd have given anything to talk to him at that time.

Entry.JapaneseText: 『大いなる実り』を、 なんとかしてあげたかったんだ
Entry.EnglishText: I'd have done anything to give him a Mana Seed...

Entry.JapaneseText: ダオスと仮面の連中の話だったのに、 つまんない話になっちゃったね
Entry.EnglishText: Woops, there I go ranting. In short, I don't know how the masked guys and Dhaos are related.

Entry.JapaneseText: いえ……いつかちゃんと ダオスに会って話が聞ければ ……いいですね
Entry.EnglishText: No, please...Listening about your talks with Dhaos is pleasing.

Entry.JapaneseText: 次、会って何も言わねーで 逃げやがったら、オレらで とっ捕まえてやるよ
Entry.EnglishText: Let's catch him next time so we can know the full picture!

Entry.JapaneseText: ありがと、 双子ちゃんはいい子だね
Entry.EnglishText: You two really are a fair pair of twins!
...Hehe~

Entry.JapaneseText: さっ、先に進もうぜ
Entry.EnglishText: All right, time to cut the chit chat and move!
